skmultiflow.evaluation.base_evaluator module¶

class skmultiflow.evaluation.base_evaluator.BaseEvaluator[source]¶

Bases: skmultiflow.core.base_object.BaseObject

The abstract class that works as a base model for all of this framework’s evaluators. It creates a basic interface that evaluation modules should follow in order to use them with all the tools available in scikit-workflow.

This class should not me instantiated, as none of its methods, except the get_class_type, are implemented.

Raises:NotImplementedError: This is an abstract class.
eval(stream, classifier)[source]¶

This function evaluates the classifier, using the class parameters, and by feeding it with instances coming from the stream parameter.

Parameters:
  • stream (BaseInstanceStream extension) – The stream to be use in the evaluation process.
  • classifier (BaseClassifier extension or list of BaseClassifier extensions) – The classifier or classifiers to be evaluated.
Returns:

The trained classifier’s at the end of the evaluation process.
Return type:

BaseClassifier extension or list of BaseClassifier extensions
get_class_type()[source]¶
get_info()[source]¶
partial_fit(X, y, classes=None)[source]¶

Partially fits the classifiers.

X: numpy.ndarray of shape (n_samples, n_features)
The feature’s matrix.
y: Array-like
An array-like containing the class labels of all samples in X.
classes: list
A list containing all class labels of the classification problem.
Returns:The trained classifier’s at the end of the evaluation process.
Return type:BaseClassifier extension or list of BaseClassifier extensions
predict(X)[source]¶

Predicts with the classifier, or classifiers, being evaluated.

X: numpy.ndarray of shape (n_samples, n_features)
The feature’s matrix.
Returns:A list containing the array-likes representing each classifier’s prediction.
Return type:list
set_params(dict)[source]¶

Pass parameter names and values through a dictionary so that their values can be updated.

Parameters:dict (dictionary) – A dictionary where the keys are parameters’ names and the values are the new values for those parameters.
